meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, L1FN Auditorium and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call to Order
agenda_items.description: Call to order by the President.

agenda_items.title: Roll Call
agenda_items.description: Roll call conducted by the Housing Project Manager.

agenda_items.title: Public Comments
agenda_items.description: Public comments on items IV – XI.

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes for the February 11, 2025 meeting.

agenda_items.title: Executive Session
agenda_items.description: Executive session to deliberate a discretionary annual bonus for the General Manager.

agenda_items.title: Action Item: Discretionary Annual Bonus
agenda_items.description: Consider and take action regarding a discretionary annual bonus for the General Manager.

agenda_items.title: Resolution for Oak & Ellum
agenda_items.description: Consider and adopt partnership resolutions for the Oak & Ellum development.

agenda_items.title: Resolution for Mountain Creek
agenda_items.description: Consider and adopt a resolution for a loan to Builders of Hope CDC for single family homes.

agenda_items.title: Discussion of 2025 Budget
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the Corporation’s 2025 Budget.

agenda_items.title: Treasurer’s Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the Treasurer’s report for January 2025.

agenda_items.title: Pipeline Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the Corporation’s pipeline report as of March 11, 2025.

financial_items.description: Loan to Builders of Hope CDC for single family homes.
